snippet.textDisplay: This is actually an arrangement of a song called "Knight's Song" by the band T-square. T-Square has created several official themes for Japan's F-1 racing events. I highly suggest checking them out if you like this.

snippet.textDisplay: +Mel Baton (Mellow Baton) Masahiro Andoh/ T-Square. He originally wrote this song for Grand Turismo, but later released the song with his band T-Square where it is known as "Knights Song".

snippet.textDisplay: Huh. Makes me wonder why this song wasn't in the Western releases? It's such an awesome tune!
snippet.textOriginal: Huh. Makes me wonder why this song wasn't in the Western releases? It's such an awesome tune!

snippet.textDisplay: The song's by an actual Japanese band, T-Square, and Japan is _notoriously_ fiendish and picky with music rights, which is why a lot of series tend to get instrumental versions of songs overseas if not replace them entirely. "Moon Over the Castle" is one of many casualties as a result unfortunately.
snippet.textOriginal: The song's by an actual Japanese band, T-Square, and Japan is _notoriously_ fiendish and picky with music rights, which is why a lot of series tend to get instrumental versions of songs overseas if not replace them entirely. "Moon Over the Castle" is one of many casualties as a result unfortunately.

snippet.textDisplay:
I've played every GT game since GT3, but never had the chance to go back and play the first two.
The soundtracks were mostly hit-or-miss for me, but this track is pretty nice. It actually sort of sounds like what I'd expect to hear during a finale boss battle in a Final Fantasy game...

snippet.textDisplay: The first Gran Turismo is also easily the one I played most from this great racing sim series. Moon Over The Castle is the series' main theme, having made appearances in all the games so far (at least in Japan). Classic theme for a classic series. This game really blew me away back then.
snippet.textOriginal: The first Gran Turismo is also easily the one I played most from this great racing sim series. Moon Over The Castle is the series' main theme, having made appearances in all the games so far (at least in Japan). Classic theme for a classic series. This game really blew me away back then.

snippet.textDisplay: I have GT 3 for the PS2.  GT is actually my second favorite racing series behind the Mario Kart series.  I had a lot of fun with the third game.  I absolutely love this song.  I really need to listen to more music from this series.
